title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.2 - Coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 156.2 - Coverage

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all annual salaried employees in the

Rent Regulation Services Unit in the competitive, noncompetitive, exempt and
labor classes whose positions have been allocated to a salary grade other than
grade 38 and such other employees whose positions are unallocated but are
equated to salary grades by the Director of the Budget. Excluded from coverage
for the purpose of performance advances are those employees whose positions are
both unallocated and not equated to a salary grade, those employees in
positions allocated to grade 38 and those employees paid on other than an
annual salary basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
156.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
